charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_0:
Ohh, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Did you come here to battle as well?

I myself have been battling nonstop since
this morning!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0401_0:
But of course! So much that I don’t even notice the
time passing!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0402_0:
That’s right! I got so wrapped up in it, I didn’t
even notice the time passing!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_0:
Back at the Battle Tower, I was there to face
challengers...
but here on Pasio, I’m just another Trainer!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_1:
I simply can’t tell you how much fun I’ve been
having battling as a challenger myself!

And I’m really grateful to Regigigas too, for
sticking with me through all this.

Regigigas is a really reliable partner...and it’s
extremely powerful!

So powerful that legend tells of it towing whole
continents with ropes in ancient times.

Because of that, at first I thought the two of us
could overcome all of Pasio’s sync pairs
put together...

But it’s clearly not going to be that easy. This
place is jam-packed with strong opponents!

So I figured that for the time being, Regigigas and
I could train here on Pasio to become even
more powerful!

And now that you’re here... Well, it must be some
sort of sign, wouldn’t you say?

And when two Trainers meet, you know what
happens next!

You know, once you’re an adult, it’s a lot harder
to keep up the habit of battling any Trainer whose
eyes you meet.
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_2:
But I’m trying to remember the way I felt back
when I was a kid!

Ahh! Oh no! I’m supposed to meet up with my son
in just a bit!

I guess I got so wrapped up in our conversation
that I totally forgot!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0401_2:
Yeah, that’s right! I hear you’ve become friends
with him, too!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0402_2: Yes, he’s a Trainer named Barry...
Oh, really? It’s nice to hear you two get along!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_2:
It sure makes me proud as a parent to see how
strong and confident he’s grown through his
adventures outside of Sinnoh...
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_3: But I still can’t help worrying about him a bit!

He just can’t seem to stay still for a moment, you
see... I wonder who he takes after...
Hm? What are you looking at me like that for?
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0401_3:
You think Barry and I are similar? You mean
because we’re both so strong and confident...?
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_0402_3:
What, because I’m strong and confident too?
Hahaha! You’ve got that right!
charaepi_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2301_1201_3:
At this rate I’ll be late to meet Barry, and he’ll
make me pay a fine!

So I’ll see you later! Next time, we’ve definitely
got to have a battle!
